dmca.title: Warner Bros. complains of posting from Superman Returns
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam: 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. ("Warner Bros.").
 
Warner Bros. is the owner of trademark, copyright and other intellectual property rights in and to the motion picture entitled SUPERMAN RETURNS (the "SUPERMAN RETURNS Property"). Because of these rights, no one is authorized to manufacture, distribute, copy, sell and/or offer for sale products utilizing the SUPERMAN RETURNS Property without the express written permission of Warner Bros. 

It has recently come to our attention that the web site located at  http://justared.blogspot.com/2005/12/brandon-routh.html is offering content from the SUPERMAN RETURNS Property. I have a good faith belief that such content is not authorized by Warner Bros., its agent, or the law and therefore infringe Warner Bros.' rights. Therefore, please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the above-referenced web site. 

Please confirm that you have taken the appropriate action at your earliest convenience. Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter and please advise should you have any questions or require any additional information. 

This letter is not a complete statement of Warner Bros.
